data.actual_result: Your profile won't load and you cannot click on your profile
data.expected_result: Your profile should load normally and you will se it on online list
data.short_description: After going invisible and going back online in a short amount of time your profile won't load in online list (must be on top of online list )
data.steps_to_repro: - Note:Works only with users that have higher role than you or if you are at the top of online list- Go to a server where you or someone with higher rank than yours is at the top of online list  - Go to invisible status/or ask higher role person to do it - Go back to online status - Discord will put you or him to online list but you won't be able to see your profile loaded (only gray lines)
